amendment.description: Amendment removes GI benefits from the maximum educational award calculation so that veterans have full access to national service educational benefits.
amendment.purpose: Amendment numbered 3 printed in House Report 110-39 to remove veteran's educational benefits from being taken into account when calculating the maximum award an individual could receive for participating in one of the national service programs.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Hunter amendment (A003) Agreed to by voice vote.
